languages.text: {n}Увы, среди охраны трудовых лагерей было мало владеющих книжной премудростью людей. Большинство "неправильных" заключенных просто забили до смерти на допросах. Но один надзиратель, наделенный художественным даром, кое-что заметил.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, среди охраны трудовых лагерей было мало владеющих книжной премудростью людей. Большинство "неправильных" заключенных просто забили до смерти на допросах. Но один надзиратель, наделенный художественным даром, кое-что заметил.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who have possessed some sort of academic wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during the interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for artistry, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who have possessed some sort of academic wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during the interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for artistry, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，劳改营的大部分监察员没什么脑子，绝大多数“行迹古怪”的囚犯在审讯期间被活活打死。不过，某位颇具审讯艺术天赋的监察员确实注意到了某些东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many overseers who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the "strange" prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，劳改营的大部分监察员没什么脑子，绝大多数“行迹古怪”的囚犯在审讯期间被活活打死。不过，某位颇具审讯艺术天赋的监察员确实注意到了某些东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lamentablemente, no había muchos vigilantes de campos de trabajo que tuvieran algún tipo de sabiduría erudita: a la mayoría de los presos «extraños» simplemente los mataban a golpes durante los interrogatorios. Pero uno de los vigilantes, que poseía un don para lo artístico, se dio cuenta de algo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lamentablemente, no había muchos vigilantes de campos de trabajo que tuvieran algún tipo de sabiduría erudita: a la mayoría de los presos «extraños» simplemente los mataban a golpes durante los interrogatorios. Pero uno de los vigilantes, que poseía un don para lo artístico, se dio cuenta de algo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}残念ながら、ある種の学識を持った労働収容所の監視役はあまり多くはなかった...ほとんどの' 奇妙な' 囚人は、尋問中に殴り殺されてしまった。しかし、そんな中、芸術的な才能を持つ監視役の一人が、あることに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}残念ながら、ある種の学識を持った労働収容所の監視役はあまり多くはなかった...ほとんどの' 奇妙な' 囚人は、尋問中に殴り殺されてしまった。しかし、そんな中、芸術的な才能を持つ監視役の一人が、あることに気づいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malheureusement, trop peu de gardiens ont un degré d'instruction suffisant... La plupart des détenus "étranges" sont tout simplement battus à mort lors des interrogatoires. Cela étant, l'un des gardiens ayant quelque don artistique, remarque quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malheureusement, trop peu de gardiens ont un degré d'instruction suffisant... La plupart des détenus "étranges" sont tout simplement battus à mort lors des interrogatoires. Cela étant, l'un des gardiens ayant quelque don artistique, remarque quelque chose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bedauerlicherweise gab es unter den Wärtern des Zwangsarbeiterlagers nur wenige, die zumindest ein klein wenig gelehrt waren. Die meisten der 'merkwürdigen' Gefangenen wurden während des Verhörs schlicht totgeprügelt. Einer der Wärter aber, der eine künstlerische Ader besaß, bemerkte etwas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

Die meisten der 'merkwürdigen' Gefangenen wurden während des Verhörs schlicht totgeprügelt. Einer der Wärter aber, der eine künstlerische Ader besaß, bemerkte etwas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki tahsilatlı sorgulama anlayışı, gözetmenlerde pek bulunmuyordu. Tuhaf hükümlülerin çoğu, sorguları sırasında ölesiye dövülmüştü. Ancak sıra dışı bir detay, sanata yatkın gözetmenlerden biri sayesinde tespit edilebildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne yazık ki tahsilatlı sorgulama anlayışı, gözetmenlerde pek bulunmuyordu. Tuhaf hükümlülerin çoğu, sorguları sırasında ölesiye dövülmüştü. Ancak sıra dışı bir detay, sanata yatkın gözetmenlerden biri sayesinde tespit edilebildi.{/n}
